description.raw:
* Admins must choose which worlds to enable when starting a new constellation

![enwo1.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/4049624270-enwo1.png)

* Worlds are stored in the round data in a `data.worlds` array

* For backwards compatibility, rounds containing no `worlds` array have all buttons enabled

* Rounds with an empty `worlds` array mean they were launched by competitors during practice, so we display all rounds

* For rounds started by admins, only the enabled worlds start buttons show up:

![enwo2.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/494891713-enwo2.png)
![enwo3.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/1695713366-enwo3.png)
![enwo4.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/2573929917-enwo4.png)
description.html:
• Admins must choose which worlds to enable when starting a new constellation

  • Worlds are stored in the round data in a data.worlds array

  • For backwards compatibility, rounds containing no worlds array have all buttons enabled

  • Rounds with an empty worlds array mean they were launched by competitors during practice, so we display all rounds

  • For rounds started by admins, only the enabled worlds start buttons show up:

title.raw: [SRC] Select worlds for constellations started by admins
